titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit disbursements of non-Federal funds by foreign nationals in campaigns for election for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 10/09/1998--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 with regard to the ban on contributions by foreign nationals to apply such ban to disbursements instead of contributions. Prohibits (soft money) disbursements by foreign nationals for political committees of political parties and for independent expenditures in campaigns for election to Federal office.
